text: “Nena: “Inu eni buku (la Allah, Ayuda ndi Akhrisitu!) Idzani ku liwu lolingana pakati pathu ndi inu (lakuti) tisapembedze aliyense koma Allah (Mmodzi Yekha), ndiponso tisamphatikize ndi chilichonse ndipo ena mwa ife asawasandutse anzawo kukhala milungu m’malo mwa Allah.” Ngati atembenuka ndi kunyoza, nenani: “Ikirani umboni kuti ife ndife Asilamu (ogonjera malamulo a Allah).”
